title: Shopp.my - One Stop place for your ecommerce needs
desc: Shopp.my is a full-featured e-commerce web application to showcase my full stack development skills with advance techniques having many features like Large Product Database, Real-Time Filtering and Searching System , Payment Integration etc

title: ChatBuddy - OneStop place for personal interaction
desc: Developed a full-stack web application, leveraging Cloudinary for robust image storage, Socket.io for real-time data transfer, and Redux for proper state management. Created production-ready code with an admin panel.

title: Pizza Paradise - a new Era of Pizza booking
desc: MERN stack pizza booking app with authentication, advance logics, sleek design, and MongoDB integration for scalability.

title: OpenBlogs - A Place Share Thoughts
desc: A platform designed to empower you to express yourself and connect with others made using MERN STACK with TailwindCSS and Cloudinary

title: FilmSphere-The-place-to-become-more-energetic
desc: FilmSphere is a dynamic platform powered by Chakra, ReactJS, Firebase, and TMDB API. It offers authentication, authorization, and a watchlist feature, utilizing Firebase database and dynamic routing for a personalized experience.

title: ExpeditionXplorer.com
desc: This website showcases my ReactJS skills in managing API-based data and state management. It also demonstrates my ability to design a real-life travel website using CSS. The result is a beautifully crafted product that I'm proud of.

title: Reactjs Advanced Cart System
desc: This is a highly realistic cart system. In this project, I have utilized advanced state management techniques to create a scalable cart and make all data dynamic. All products are fetched using API data. I have also employed various hooks for advanced state management, such as useEffect(), useContext(), useState(), and many other JavaScript concepts.

title: Dynamic Pizza Paradise: A React-Tailwind Delight !
desc: Developed a dynamic and interactive Pizza Shop web using React.js,Tailwind CSS, HTML, and CSS. Utilized React hooks(useState, useEffect)and JavaScript functions(filter(), map()) forefficient data handling and enhanced userexperience.

title: Task Manager Pro: Task Mastery with React Magic!
desc: Created a Task Manager application with React.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML, and CSS, featuring local storage for data storage Utilized React hooks for managing state and building a responsive user interface Nostalgia Arcade: Relive Classics in Modern Style!
